name: Hunt Twist
description:
Hunt Twist is a little platformer shooter game where you are a hunter, but suddenly you need to save your life while exploring and killing monsters.

This game was made for Secret Santa Jam 2021! Also its my second game i've made, i'm new to gamedev so probably there's some bugs, but i hope you enjoy!

How to Play

WASD/Space for basic movement

Left Mouse Button to shoot

J or Z to interact with NPCs

Simple, right?
